short_description_localized.en: Relax in one of our mini-suites that include a separate parlor and bedroom.
short_description_localized.es: Relax in one of our mini-suites that include a separate parlor and bedroom.

description_localized.en: Relax in one of our mini-suites that include a separate parlor and bedroom. Each room features one king bed with comfortable pillow top mattresses, sofa sleeper, refrigerator, armoire, iron and ironing board, hair dryer and coffee maker.
description_localized.es: Relax in one of our mini-suites that include a separate parlor and bedroom. Each room features one king bed with comfortable pillow top mattresses, sofa sleeper, refrigerator, armoire, iron and ironing board, hair dryer and coffee maker.
